snippet.title: Flailure Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Checkout Flailure on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/835800/Flailure/ 

Flailure is a 4-player competition for the crown with unconventional medieval combat. With hookshot powered flail in hand, take on your friends in fast paced physics combat. Will you be king or just end up a flailure?
